sentence.Network_en: The Audit Commission said that the ministry was in the clear.
sentence.Network_cn: 审计署称该政府部门没有问题。

sentence.Network_en: Why did the bank not conduct its own audit before lending still more?
sentence.Network_cn: 银行为什么不在贷出更多钱之前先审计自己的账目呢？

sentence.Network_en: The bank first learned of the problem when it carried out an internal audit.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行是在进行内部审计的时候首次发现了这个问题。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin auditus 'hearing', from audire 'hear', in medieval Latin auditus (compoti) 'audit (of an account)', an audit originally being presented orally

entry.def: When an accountant audits an organization's accounts, he or she examines the accounts officially in order to make sure that they have been done correctly.

example.ex: Each year they audit our accounts and certify them as being true and fair.
example.tran: 他们每年对我们进行账务审核，以确保其真实无误。

means.word_mean: 1. an inspection of the accounting procedures and records by a trained accountant or CPA
2. a methodical examination or review of a condition or situation;

sentences.sentence: "he made an audit of all the plants on his property"

means.word_mean: 1. of accounts and tax returns; with the intent to verify
2. attend academic courses without getting credit

auth_sentence.content: Their internal audit function is constantly carrying out inspections.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their internal audit function is constantly carrying out inspections.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their internal audit function is constantly carrying out inspections.

auth_sentence.content: However, the audit work itself could be fairly grim.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, the audit work itself could be fairly grim.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, the audit work itself could be fairly grim.

auth_sentence.content: An outside organization will audit the program within a year.
auth_sentence.res_content: An outside organization will audit the program within a year.

stems_affixes.word_buile: audit听+ion动作或状态→听[演员]唱→试听

sentences.en: The accounts have to be audited by a firm of external auditors.
sentences.cn: 这些账目必须由一家外聘审计员的公司来稽查。

jushi.english: The company hasn't carried out a proper audit for over a year.
jushi.chinese: 该公司已经有一年多没有正式查过账了。

jushi.english: The yearly audit takes place each December.
jushi.chinese: 年度审计在每年的12月份进行。

jushi.english: The stockholder demanded an audit of the firm's accounts.
jushi.chinese: 该股东要求核查公司的账目。
